title: 09: S6E09 – "Short and Shivery" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you five terrifying tales from authors Meagan J. Meehan, Drew Stepek, Blair Daniels, Kevin Thomas, and Dylan Sindelar, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about eerie enchantments, creepy cabins, awful animals, locomotive legends, and forest fiends.  

                                    
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
